title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.4 - Agency conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.4 - Agency conference

State Regulations

Agency conference means an informal meeting at which an
applicant or recipient may have any decision of a social services agency
concerning the applicant's or recipient's public assistance, medical
assistance, food stamp benefits, HEAP or services reviewed or may have any
other aspect of the applicant's or recipient's case reviewed by an employee of
that agency who has the authority to change the decision with which the
applicant or recipient disagrees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
